title: Recognizing and Managing Implicit Bias in Medical Education: Participatory Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of medical communication and basic concepts of patient interaction
context.additional_context: Participatory educational design combining theoretical understanding of implicit bias with practical case applications for students preparing for healthcare careers; emphasizes activity-based learning such as online discussions, role-playing, and reflective journaling

learning_goals: Learners can define implicit bias and explain its impact in healthcare settings
Learners can identify implicit bias in diverse patient scenarios and apply management strategies
Learners can recognize personal biases through self-reflection and develop improvement plans

resources: Implicit Association Test (IAT) for Bias Assessment

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
